category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: ARM_create_changeitem
preference.preference_description: Activates the "Create Change Object" performance transaction. This measures the elapsed time from the beginning of the operation to the insertion of the initial task into all target inboxes. This action occurs only when the "Start Process On Create" option is checked while creating a new change. Valid Values: * ON: Enables performance monitoring of the "Create Change Object" performance transaction. * OFF: Suppresses performance monitoring of the "Create Change Object" performance transaction.
